meanings.definition: Situated or occurring between the ribs.
meanings.sent1: The intercostal space felt tight after the injury.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the intercostal area on the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The intercostal picnic spot was cozy between the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an intercostal breeze, refreshing and light.
meanings.sent5: The intercostal view from the hilltop was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Relating to the muscles between the ribs.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his intercostal muscles.
meanings.sent2: The intercostal exercises helped strengthen his core.
meanings.sent3: The intercostal muscles flexed comically during the dance.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was an intercostal force driving her forward.
meanings.sent5: The intercostal massage provided relief after a long day.
